description: Assistance in the Development of an Integrated Water Resources Management Strategy

subproject.description:
The objective of this PD is to provide direct support to the Phase II of the MOWE-WB Cooperative Program. The main outputs that are intended to be produced to achieve the overall objective are as follows: 
1.	The development Retrospective groundwater abstraction estimate and mapping across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. (see Annex 1-1)
2.	An Economic and Financial Assessment of the use of Water in Irrigated Agriculture.
        (See Annex 1-2)
3.	An Assessment of the Capacity Building and Institutional Enhancement needs of the  MoWE
4.	Assistance to the Ministry in monitoring the progress of the two groundwater evaluation projects.
5.	The preparatory work for the development of a wells inventory data base (CADASTRE).
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Inegrated Water Resources Mana
